title: Border
description: One of two pieces of point de gaze with a design of swags of leaves swung from sprays of blossoms and enclosing single floral sprays. The toile of the leaves along the lower border is made in both close and open stitch, the open parts being enriched with dots. The r√©seau ground is ver fine. Upper edge finished with a band of insertion.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Henry L. Chisholm
